verses.text: My \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* is \w corrupt|strong="H2254"\w*, my \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are \w extinct|strong="H2193"\w*, the \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* \add are ready\add* for me.\f + \fr 17.1 \ft breath…: or, spirit is spent\f*

\add Are there\add* not \w mockers|strong="H2049"\w* with me? and doth not mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w continue|strong="H3885"\w* in their \w provocation|strong="H4784"\w*?\f + \fr 17.2 \ft continue: Heb. lodge\f*
Lay \w down|strong="H7760"\w* now, put me in a \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* with thee; who \add is\add* he \add that\add* will \w strike|strong="H8628"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* with me?
For thou hast \w hid|strong="H6845"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* from \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w*: therefore shalt thou not \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \add them\add*.

He that \w speaketh|strong="H5046"\w* \w flattery|strong="H2506"\w* to \add his\add* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, even the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*.

He hath \w made|strong="H3322"\w* me also a \w byword|strong="H4914"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and \w aforetime|strong="H6440"\w* I was as a \w tabret|strong="H8611"\w*.\f + \fr 17.6 \ft aforetime: or, before them\f*

Mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* also is \w dim|strong="H3543"\w* by reason of \w sorrow|strong="H3708"\w*, and all my \w members|strong="H3338"\w* \add are\add* as a \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*.\f + \fr 17.7 \ft my members: or, my thoughts\f*

\w Upright|strong="H3477"\w* \add men\add* shall be \w astonied|strong="H8074"\w* at this, and the \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* shall stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* himself against the \w hypocrite|strong="H2611"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* also shall \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* on his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and he that hath \w clean|strong="H2890"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3254"\w* stronger and \w stronger|strong="H0555"\w*.\f + \fr 17.9 \ft be…: Heb. add strength\f*

\w But|strong="H0199"\w* as for you all, do ye \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and come \w now|strong="H0935"\w*: for I cannot \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add one\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add* among you.

My \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are \w past|strong="H5674"\w*, my \w purposes|strong="H2154"\w* are broken \w off|strong="H5423"\w*, \add even\add* the \w thoughts|strong="H4180"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.\f + \fr 17.11 \ft the thoughts: Heb. the possessions\f*

They \w change|strong="H7760"\w* the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* into \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \add is\add* \w short|strong="H7138"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.\f + \fr 17.12 \ft short: Heb. near\f*

If I \w wait|strong="H6960"\w*, the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w* \add is\add* mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: I have \w made|strong="H7502"\w* my \w bed|strong="H3326"\w* in the \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

I have \w said|strong="H7121"\w* to \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: to the \w worm|strong="H7415"\w*, \add Thou art\add* my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and my \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.\f + \fr 17.14 \ft said: Heb. cried, or, called\f*
And where \add is\add* \w now|strong="H0645"\w* my \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*? as for my \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, who shall \w see|strong="H7789"\w* it?

They shall go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w bars|strong="H0905"\w* of the \w pit|strong="H7585"\w*, when \add our\add* \w rest|strong="H5183"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \add is\add* in the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.
